(B) heptagon - Wrong, as heptagons have 7 sides. The path has 4 line segments, which corresponds to the number of sides a 4-sided polygon would have.

(J) triangle - Wrong, as triangles have 3 sides. The number of sides in the given SVG path is even and not divisible by 3.
(K) trapezoid - Wrong, as trapezoids are 2-dimensional plane figures that have one pair of parallel sides. This does not resemble the given SVG path.

The dimensions for a rectangle are length = height * base, which for this shape would be 73.00 * 55.5 = 4140.00.

The sector of a circle with an angle of 180 degrees is just the full circle itself.
